description:
A few things:
1. You have to manually add yourself to the dialout group, or run chirpw as root (there are instructions online)
2. This version is pretty out of date, and I ended up installing chirp-next from the official website to get bugfixes.

I tried programming my Baofeng Bf T1
but it can not connect to the radio.
It works on my othe radio : UV5R and 888s
summary: Can not read Baofeng BF T1

description:
Have used all suggestions offered on the Chrip website Does 
not read img. files or display any data, just a blank screen. Works
great on Windows, and I will from now on use the windows 
version and forget Linux mint version.
summary: Does not work in Linux mint 21,3 Cinnamon

description:
I have this running on an Ubuntu 18.04.6 without problem. Trying to install on 2 other machines with the same Ubuntu version just does not work. I click download radio and nothing happens, not even an error message!

It's like pulling teeth!
summary: Virtually impossible to get working in Ubuntu!

description: Does not work with ubuntu 21.04. The buttons are missing when you try to download/upload data to radio.
No USB ports available for upload/download.

Does not work in this Ubuntu. The info box does not have a 'go' button.
Does not work in Windows because Microsoft keeps resetting the driver.
summary: I can't run it here, and I can't run it in windows

description: use it with bofeng and other supported amauture radios a usb cable is needed for programming buy supported radios and assesories from amazon.com
summary: use it with bofeng radios anmd other brands

description:
Won't run on my chromebook running Linux. When I tell it to download from the radio nothing happens.
73
John

Same as all the others wont download 

Rob N5OZB 73
Use this to program my Baofeng and Icom HTs. Saves a lot of time.
summary: Works well with Debian 11.4 and Gnome desktop

description: Gives error when downloading from Radio: "Module 'collections' has no attribute 'Callable'.
The app is easy to use: Setup, channel selections are intuitive. Have several radios set up to use.
Does not have the "ok" button to download from radio using chromebook. This makes the entire application unusable

I've been trying for days to install the most recent version (20230830) from the tarball, only to find that all instructions on how to do so are horribly deprecated. I finally tried an older version (20230200213) which only crashes on startup. It appears the authors don't care whether this package works anymore. I used to use it with little trouble, but that's no longer the case.
Buttons are missing, you can not download a radio
Required a couple of python bugs fixing for it to download and upload data. Now works with a UV-5R.
It just doesn't work. Can't download
the reviews are true and you will not be able to uninstall unless your a tech. there is no good purpose for this.

Me estoy manejando con varios equipos (la mayoría baofeng) y este soft hace MUCHO mas simple todo lo relativo a configurar canales, modos, potencias, etc. Es genial. Si tienen el respectivo cable de programación de su equipo deben tener este soft
un lujo, es rapida y liviana
muy buena aplicacion.
Un logiciel indispensable pour paramétrer rapidement sa radio.
нормально работает с баофенгами

прошил Баофенг прописал путь к порту в ручную в строке выбора портов из списка /dev/ttyCH341USB0 
прога увидела рацию-все заработало
